Control Name: Authorizes Changes—A process is in place to authorize system changes prior to development.

control_attributes.Control: Authorizes Changes—A process is in place to authorize system changes prior to development.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC8.1 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures to meet its objectives.
